title: THOUGHT / REVACHOLIAN NATIONHOOD
description: Endurance explains you are a Fascist. It's all about the Revacholian Nationhood.

dialogueTree.title: Endurance: "It's clear you like the hard stuff,..."
dialogueTree.english: It's clear you like the hard stuff, bröther.
dialogueTree.polish: Widać jak na dłoni, że lubisz mocne rzeczy, brüder.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Відаць як на далоні, што табе падабаюцца моцныя рэчы, бридер.

links.title: You: "The what? Sounds like my stomach is..."
links.english: The what? Sounds like my stomach is growling...
links.polish: Że co? Chyba mi coś bulgocze w brzuchu...
links.belarusian: Што? Здаецца, у мяне нешта бурліць у жываце...

links.title: Endurance: "Evening falls. The time has come to..."
links.english: Evening falls. The time has come to take the vows.
links.polish: Nadchodzi wieczór. Przyszedł czas złożyć śluby.
links.belarusian: Набліжаецца вечар. Прыйшоў час даць зарокі.

links.title: You: "Vows?"
links.english: Vows?
links.polish: Śluby?
links.belarusian: Вяселлі?

links.title: Endurance: "The Vows of Blööd and Flesh."
links.english: The Vows of Blööd and Flesh.
links.polish: Ślüby krwi i ciała.
links.belarusian: Шлюбы крыві і цела.

links.title: You: "What is my lower intestine going on..."
links.english: What is my lower intestine going on about?
links.polish: Co to moje jelito grube znów wygaduje?
links.belarusian: Што зноў выдумляе мой тоўсты кішэчнік?

links.title: Endurance: "Lower intestine? The term is METABO..."
links.english: Lower intestine? The term is METABOLIC AND CIRCULATORY SYSTEM.
links.polish: Jelito grube? To UKŁAD METABOLICZNY I KRĄŻENIOWY.
links.belarusian: Тоўстая кішка? Гэта МЕТАБАЛІЧНАЯ І КАРАБОКРЫГО ГАСІСТЭМА.

links.title: You: "Okay, but... what's *the hard stuff..."
links.english: Okay, but... what's *the hard stuff*?
links.polish: No dobra, ale co to są te *mocne rzeczy*?
links.belarusian: Ну добра, але што гэта такія *моцныя рэчы*?

links.title: Endurance: "*Fascism*, bröther."
links.english: *Fascism*, bröther.
links.polish: *Faszyzm*, brüder.
links.belarusian: *Фашызм*, браце.

links.title: You: "What *is* fascism, though?"
links.english: What *is* fascism, though?
links.polish: Ale czym *jest* faszyzm?
links.belarusian: Але чым *з'яўляецца* фашызм?

links.title: Endurance: "Many things, but it's möstly about..."
links.english: Many things, but it's möstly about trusting your gut. Who does your gut tell you is the source of Revachol's problems?
links.polish: Wielöma rzeczami, ale przede wszystkim słuchaniem swoich przeczuć. A co mówią ci przeczucia na temat źródła problemów w Revacholu?
links.belarusian: Шматлікімі рэчамі, але перш за ўсё слуханнем сваіх інтуіцыі. А што кажуць табе гэтыя інтуіцыі пра крыніцы праблем у Рэвашолі?

links.title: You: "Foreigners?"
links.english: Foreigners?
links.polish: Cudzoziemcy?
links.belarusian: Замежнікі?

links.title: Endurance: "Yes, them, but also..."
links.english: Yes, them, but also...
links.polish: Tak, zgadza się, ale też...
links.belarusian: Так, згодны, але таксама...

links.title: Endurance: "...wömen."
links.english: ...wömen.
links.polish: Köbiety.
links.belarusian: Жанчыны.

links.title: You: "Wömen?"
links.english: Wömen?
links.polish: Köbiety?
links.belarusian: Жанчыны?

links.title: Endurance: "Wö-Men. Men of Wö. You don't like t..."
links.english: Wö-Men. Men of Wö. You don't like them. They're insane. Their idiocy needs to be scrubbed off this world with rubbing alcohol. Wömen need to go back to the fucking kitchen.
links.polish: Köbiety. Plemię z Köb. Nie lubisz ich. Są obłąkane. Ich głupota musi zostać wymazana z tego świata, starta alkoholowym zmywaczem. Köbiety powinny siedzieć w jebanej küchni.
links.belarusian: Жанчыны. Племя з Кёб. Ты іх не любіш. Яны вар'яты. Іхняя дурнота павінна быць сцёрта з гэтага свету, змытая алкагольным сродкам. Кёбкі павінны сядзець у праклятай кухні.

links.title: Endurance: "That's what fascism boils down to...."
links.english: That's what fascism boils down to. The rest is also important, but the *main thing* is that wömen need to *know their place*.
links.polish: Do tego właśnie sprowadza się faszyzm. Reszta też jest ważna, ale *kluczowe* jest to, żeby köbiety *znały swoje miejsce*.
links.belarusian: Менавіта да гэтага зводзіцца фашызм. Астатняе таксама важна, але *ключавое* тое, каб жанчыны *ведалі сваё месца*.

links.title: You: "Financiers?"
links.english: Financiers?
links.polish: Finansiści?
links.belarusian: Фінансісты?

links.title: You: "Leftist academicians?"
links.english: Leftist academicians?
links.polish: Lewaccy akademicy?
links.belarusian: Левыя акадэмікі?

links.title: You: "Liberals?"
links.english: Liberals?
links.polish: Liberałowie?
links.belarusian: Лібералы?

links.title: You: "I thought you were my circulatory s..."
links.english: I thought you were my circulatory system?
links.polish: Myślałem, że jesteś moim układem krążenia?
links.belarusian: Я думаў, што ты мой сістэмы кровазвароту?

links.title: Endurance: "Quit stalling, bröther! We were tal..."
links.english: Quit stalling, bröther! We were talking about the weakest, worst, most insane thing. The weak link!
links.polish: Przestań zwlekać, brüder! Mówimy o tym, co najwątlejsze, najgorsze, najbardziej obłąkane. O najsłabszym ogniwie!
links.belarusian: Перастань адкладаць, браце! Мы гаворым пра самае слабое, самае горшае, самае вар'яцкае. Пра самае слабое звяно!

links.title: You: "But I'm a feminist!"
links.english: But I'm a feminist!
links.polish: Ale ja jestem feministą!
links.belarusian: Але я фемініст!

links.title: Endurance: "Föminist? No! It can't be. Not you...."
links.english: Föminist? No! It can't be. Not you. No one believes this.
links.polish: Föministą? Nie! Niemożliwe. Nie ty. Nikt w to nie wierzy.
links.belarusian: Феміністам? Не! Немагчыма. Не ты. Ніхто ў гэта не верыць.

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "Did you know you can FORGET Thought..."
links.english: Did you know you can FORGET Thoughts? Go to your THOUGHT CABINET and FORGET all about föminism.
links.polish: Czy wiesz, że możesz ZAPOMINAĆ myśli? Przejdź do SCHOWKA MYŚŁI i ZAPOMNIJ całkowicie o föminizmie.
links.belarusian: Ці ведаеш ты, што можаш ЗАБЫВАЦЬ думкі? Перайдзі ў СКЛАД ДУМОК і ЗАБУДЗЬ цалкам пра фемінізм.

links.title: You: "Am I having some kind of stomach se..."
links.english: Am I having some kind of stomach seizure?
links.polish: Czy ja mam jakiś atak boleści w brzuchu?
links.belarusian: Ці ў мяне прыступ болю ў жываце?

links.title: Endurance: "Stomach truth. You're having a stom..."
links.english: Stomach truth. You're having a stomach *truth*.
links.polish: Brzuszna prawda. Brzuch mówi ci *prawdę*.
links.belarusian: Жыўцевая праўда. Жывот кажа вам *праўду*.

links.title: You: "Why am I getting this?"
links.english: Why am I getting this?
links.polish: Czemu cię w ogóle słyszę?
links.belarusian: Чаму я наогул цябе чую?

links.title: Endurance: "Because you've said the hard things..."
links.english: Because you've said the hard things, that others won't say. The gööd things. You've said them many times.
links.polish: Bo powiedziałeś rzeczy mocne i trudne, których inni nie mówią. Döbre rzeczy. Mówiłeś je wielokrotnie.
links.belarusian: Бо ты сказаў моцныя і складаныя рэчы, якіх іншыя не кажуць. Добрыя рэчы. Ты казаў іх неаднаразова.

links.title: You: "*Fascism* sounds so bad, though. Wh..."
links.english: *Fascism* sounds so bad, though. What if we called it something else? Like, uh, *traditionalism*?
links.polish: Ale *faszyzm* brzmi bardzo źle. A gdybyśmy nazwali go jakoś inaczej? Na przykład *tradycjonalizmem*?
links.belarusian: Але *фашызм* гучыць вельмі дрэнна. А калі б мы назвалі яго як-небудзь інакш? Напрыклад, *традыцыяналізмам*?

links.title: Endurance: "Ökay. Yes. Let's call it that. Good..."
links.english: Ökay. Yes. Let's call it that. Good thinking.
links.polish: Döbrze. Tak. Tak to nazwijmy. Mądrze.
links.belarusian: Добра. Так. Так гэта назавем. Мудра.

links.title: Rhetoric: "That sounds much better. Traditiona..."
links.english: That sounds much better. Traditionalism. You like the sound of that.
links.polish: To brzmi o wiele lepiej. Tradycjonalizm. Podoba ci się to słowo.
links.belarusian: Гэта гучыць значна лепш. Традыцыяналізм. Табе падабаецца гэтае слова.

links.title: You: "Okay, stomach. I've made up my mind..."
links.english: Okay, stomach. I've made up my mind about fascism. (Proceed to the Jüdgement.)
links.polish: Dobrze, brzuchu. Podjąłem decyzję co do faszyzmu. (Przejdź do osądü).
links.belarusian: Добра, жывот. Я прыняў рашэнне адносна фашызму. (Перайсці да асуджэння).

links.title: Endurance: "You're going to keep your vöws, rig..."
links.english: You're going to keep your vöws, right? Keep your vöws, bröther!
links.polish: Dotrzymasz swoich ślübów, prawda? Dotrzymuj ślübów, brüder!
links.belarusian: Ты стрымаеш свае шлюбы, праўда? Стрымай шлюбы, братка!

links.title: You: "I will keeps my vöws... for the glo..."
links.english: I will keeps my vöws... for the glory of the Revacholian nation. (Opt in.)
links.polish: Dotrzymam ślübów... ku chwale narodu revacholskiego. (Wejdź w to).
links.belarusian: Я выканаю абяцанні... на славу народу Рэвашоля. (Увайдзіце ў гэта).

links.title: Endurance: "For the nation... smart. Best not t..."
links.english: For the nation... smart. Best not to mention *the wömen* too often. That's why you're the head and I am the stomach.
links.polish: Dla narodu... Sprytnie. Lepiej nie wspominać za dużo o köbietach. Dlatego właśnie ty jesteś głową, a ja tylko brzuchem.
links.belarusian: Для народа... Хітра. Лепш не згадваць занадта шмат пра жанчын. Вось чаму менавіта ты з"яўляешся галавой, а я толькі жывотам.

links.title: You: "No, fascism is about industry and p..."
links.english: No, fascism is about industry and politics and nationhood, not wömen. I'm absolutely okay with women.
links.polish: Nie, w faszyzmie chodzi o przemysł, politykę i narodowość, nie köbiety. One mi zupełnie nie przeszkadzają.
links.belarusian: Не, у фашызме гаворка ідзе пра прамысловасць, палітыку і нацыянальнасць, не пра жанчын. Яны мне зусім не перашкаджаюць.

links.title: Endurance: "Of course you are, bröther. Of cour..."
links.english: Of course you are, bröther. Of course. (A wink-shaped growl sounds from your ass.)
links.polish: Oczywiście, że nie, brüder. Oczywiście. (Z dupy wydobywa ci się odgłos przypominający puszczenie oczka).
links.belarusian: Вядома, што не, брüдер. Вядома. (З дупы ўзнікае гук, які нагадвае падміргванне).

links.title: You: "Pat your stomach. [Finish thought.]"
links.english: Pat your stomach. [Finish thought.]
links.polish: Poklep się po brzuchu. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: Пахлопай сябе па жываце. [Законч думку].

links.title: Endurance: "For the nation... smart. Best not t..."
links.english: For the nation... smart. Best not to mention *the wömen issue* too often. People are not ready.
links.polish: Dla narodu... Sprytnie. Lepiej nie wspominać za dużo o *kwestii köbiet*. Ludzie nie są na to gotowi.
links.belarusian: Для народа... Хітра. Лепш не ўзгадваць занадта шмат пра *пытанне жанчын*. Людзі да гэтага не гатовыя.

links.title: You: "Absolutely not. I'm not going to be..."
links.english: Absolutely not. I'm not going to be played by an upset stomach. (Opt out.)
links.polish: Mowy nie ma. Nie będzie mną tu rządził podrażniony brzuch. (Nie wchodź w to).
links.belarusian: Гаворкі няма. Не будзе мной тут кіраваць раззлаваны жывот. (Не ўцягвайся ў гэта).

links.title: Endurance: "There's a slow, painful growl somew..."
links.english: There's a slow, painful growl somewhere in your intestines, knocking on your alcohol-engorged liver...
links.polish: Gdzieś przez jelita przetacza ci się powolny, bolesny pomruk odbijający się echem od twojej napuchniętej alkoholem wątroby...
links.belarusian: Дзе-небудзь праз кішачнік пракатваецца павольны, балючы рык, які адбіваецца рэхам ад тваёй распухлай ад алкаголю печані...

links.title: Endurance: "It is one of betrayal and disappoin..."
links.english: It is one of betrayal and disappointment.
links.polish: To wyraz poczucia zdrady i rozczarowania.
links.belarusian: Гэта выказванне пачуцця здрады і расчаравання.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.english: [Discard thought.]
links.polish: [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: [Адкінь думку].

links.title: Endurance: "No, no. When the blööd and the fles..."
links.english: No, no. When the blööd and the flesh call, there is no discarding them. Speak true, do you like *the hard stuff*?
links.polish: Nie, nie. Kiedy krew i ciäło wzywają, nie wolno ich odrzucać. Mów prawdę. Czy lubisz *mocne rzeczy*?
links.belarusian: Не, не. Калі кроў і цела клічуць, нельга іх ігнараваць. Кажы праўду. Ці любіш ты *моцныя рэчы*?

links.title: You: "What is *the hard stuff*?"
links.english: What is *the hard stuff*?
links.polish: Co to są *mocne rzeczy*?
links.belarusian: Што такое *моцныя рэчы*?
